short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import any URL into Newsglot to get instant translations, collect words and phrases to practice later, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Newsglot is the best way to learn to read the news in another language. Here's how it works: Import any article in any language. The Newsglot bot will extract the text, and then you'll be able highlight any word or phrase to get a translation, useful links, and be able to save your notes. You can then practice your saved highlights anytime, anyplace on the web or on the go with the Newsglot app.

This extension makes it even easier to use Newsglot and read the news in the language you're learning. Simply install this extension and then click on it from any article and it will be automatically imported into Newsglot.

Questions? Comments? Things we can do to improve this extension and Newsglot? Let us know anytime at hello@newsglot.com. Our goal is to help you learn languages faster and more efficiently than ever.
